title: Executive Order 6367-Public Water Restoration No. 76, Wyoming
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 1 of the act of June 25, 1910 (ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847-848), the Executive order of December 5, 1913, creating public water reserve no. 12, is, insofar as it pertains to the following-described lands, hereby revoked:
T. 42 N., R. 69 W., sec. 5, NW¼SW¼;
T. 46 N., R. 72 W., sec. 25, S½NW¼, NE¼SW¼.

Provided, however, That none of the aforesaid-described lands shall become subject to disposition under the laws applicable to public lands until such date and after such notice as may be hereafter determined and announced.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6367-Public Water Restoration No. 76, Wyoming Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362191
